alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Leon County through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee Comm College, or 7 miles southeast of Midway, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Belair, Andrew, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Bragg Stadium, Fort Braden, Leon County Civic Center, North Florida Fairgrounds, Kleman Plaza, Innovation Park, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex and Mission San Luis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
